message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at $11500. This is a great opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a slightly reduced price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10800. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and aiming for mutual benefit, I propose a price of $11200. This offers a slight increase from my initial offer while still being more favorable than the $12000 asking price. I hope this proposal works for you.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10900? I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider a price closer to your range. Therefore, I propose a price of $11000 for the product. This is a reasonable compromise between our positions and should reflect the value you see in the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
